subject: Re: [junit] @Test etc not accepted?
msgSnippet: if u want to use @test,@Before u have to configure junit4.4 jar file On Sat, Apr 12, 2008 at 7:53 PM, kristoferamplitude  ... -- Thanks &
messageBody:
if u want to use @test,@Before
u have to configure junit4.4 jar file

On Sat, Apr 12, 2008 at 7:53 PM, kristoferamplitude <kauer@...>
wrote:

> Hi there.
>
> All the doco I see on JUnit talks about various annotations, like
> @Test, @Before and so on. I'm using Java 1.4 in Eclipse 3.2 with Junit
> 3.8.1 and these annotations just get flagged as errors.
>
> Do they only work with later versions of Java? Of JUnit? Is there
> something I need to install or turn on?
>
> Thanks, K.
>
>
>



--
Thanks & Regards,

Pankaj Khare
QA Engineer
Rishabh Software Pvt. Ltd.
